error.document: The page property "Document path" is not set.
error.mainmenucontainer: The dynamic property "MainMenuContainer" is not set.

error.loginfail: Log in failed. The supplied user name or password were incorrect.
error.password: You must fill in a password
error.username: You must specify a user name

property.name: ConfirmationMessage
property.caption: Confirmation message
property.help: Text that will be sent in the confirmation e-mail.

property.name: ContactPage
property.caption: Contact page
property.help: Link to the page with contact information.

property.name: Description
property.caption: Heading for RSS source
property.help: Specify a heading for RSS source

property.name: DocumentListRoot
property.caption: Fetch document list from
property.help: Specify the page you want to fetch the document listing from. If not set, the page list will not be shown.

property.name: DocumentPath
property.caption: Path to document
property.help: Path to a copy of the source document

property.name: EmailBody
property.caption: E-mail body
property.help: Content of the e-mail address that will be sent.

property.name: EmailSender
property.caption: E-mail sender
property.help: E-mail address that will be used as sender address.

property.name: EmailSubject
property.caption: E-mail subject
property.help: Subject of the e-mail to be sent.

property.name: EmbeddedObjectHeight
property.caption: Height of the flash movie
property.help: Specify the height of the flash movie in pixels.

property.name: EmbeddedObjectWidth
property.caption: Width of the flash movie
property.help: Specify the width of the flash movie in pixels.

property.name: EmbeddedURL
property.caption: Path to flash movie
property.help: Specify the address to the Flash movie

property.name: EnableStatistics
property.caption: Show statistics
property.help: Show statistics on page for visitors.

property.name: EPSUBSCRIBE
property.caption: Activate subscription
property.help: Activates a subscription for this page

property.name: EPSUBSCRIBE-EXCLUDE
property.caption: Block subscription for this page
property.help: Select this check box to block subscription updates for this page.

property.name: EPSUBSCRIBEHIDDEN
property.caption: Do not show on the subscription page
property.help: Hides this page on the subscriptions page

property.name: EPSUBSCRIBE-ROOT
property.caption: Root page for Subscription
property.help: Specify a page in the tree from where the subscription will start.

property.name: EventsCount
property.caption: Number of Event items
property.help: Using an integer, specify the number of pages to be displayed in the listing

property.name: EventsRoot
property.caption: Fetch Event list from
property.help: Specify a page whose children will be used to generate the event list. If not set the news list will not be shown.

property.name: Heading
property.caption: Heading
property.help: Specify a heading that will present the main title of this page. If this property is not set, the page name will be used as a heading instead.

property.name: Image
property.caption: Image
property.help: Specify an image that will be shown on the startpage (900*341 pixels)

property.name: IndexRoot
property.caption: Display content from page
property.help: Specify the page from which the site map will start

property.name: IsDocumentPageType
property.caption: Upload complete HTML edition and copy of source document
property.help: Select this option to be able to display the complete HTML edition

property.name: LoginPage
property.caption: Login page
property.help: Specify the login page for this part of the site.

property.name: Logotype
property.caption: Logotype
property.help: Specify the path to the logotype image shown in the top of the website

property.name: MainBody
property.caption: Main body
property.help: The main body will be shown in the main content area of the page. You can insert for example text, images and tables, using the XHTML-editor.

property.name: MainIntro
property.caption: Introduction
property.help: Short version of the news content. This text will be used in news listings if available.

property.name: MainListCount
property.caption: Display number of pages in the main list
property.help: Using an integer, specify the number of pages to be displayed in the listing

property.name: MainListRoot
property.caption: Fetch main listing from
property.help: Specify the page from which you want to fetch the listing. The list will be shown in the main content area. If not set the page list will not be shown.

property.name: MainMenuContainer
property.caption: Display menus from
property.help: Specify a place in the menu tree from where menus will be displayed on the selected page

property.name: MetaAuthor
property.caption: Writer
property.help: Specify the author of text that will be used by search engines. If not set, the value in the dynamic property will be used instead.

property.name: MetaDescription
property.caption: Page description
property.help: Describe the content of the page

property.name: MetaKeywords
property.caption: Standard search words for pages
property.help: Specify a comma-separated list of search words that match this page

property.name: NewsCount
property.caption: Number of News items
property.help: Using an integer, specify the number of pages to be displayed in the listing

property.name: NewsRoot
property.caption: Fetch News list from
property.help: Specify a page whose children will be used to generate the news list. If not set the news list will not be shown.

property.name: PasswordChangeSuccessBody
property.caption: Password change success
property.help: Body text shown when a password change succeeds

property.name: PasswordLength
property.caption: Password length
property.help: The shortest allowed password

property.name: PrivacyPage
property.caption: Privacy page
property.help: Link to the page with legal information.

property.name: RootFolder
property.caption: Search path to folder to be displayed
property.help: Specify the address of the folder, the content of which is to be displayed in the list

property.name: RssContainer
property.caption: RSS Main Page
property.help: Specify a main page for all RSS source pages

property.name: RssSource
property.caption: RSS source page
property.help: Specify a page in the tree that is a source page of RSS content on this website.

property.name: RssUrl
property.caption: Search path to RSS source
property.help: Specify the address content in RSS format. This is usually a web address.

property.name: SearchPage
property.caption: Search page
property.help: Link to the search page for this part of the site.

property.name: SearchRoot
property.caption: Start page for the search
property.help: Specify the start page for search. If this field is left empty, the search will start from the start page

property.name: SecondaryBody
property.caption: Secondary body
property.help: The secondary body will be shown in the right column of the page. You can use both text and images for layout. Note that images should not be larger than the right area.

property.name: SecondaryListCount
property.caption: Display number of pages in the secondary list
property.help: Number of secondary list items in the list.

property.name: SecondaryListRoot
property.caption: Fetch secondary listing from
property.help: Specify the page you want to fetch the listing from. The list will be shown in the right column. If it is not set the page list will not be shown.

property.name: SitemapPage
property.caption: Site map page
property.help: Link to the site map page.

property.name: SortFilesBy
property.caption: Sort files by
property.help: Select how the list is to be sorted

property.name: SubscriptionMailBody
property.caption: Introduction text in subscription e-mail
property.help: Enter the text that will be the message body for the subscription e-mail.

property.name: SubscriptionMailFrom
property.caption: Sender address for subscription e-mail
property.help: E-mail address that will be used as sender for the subscription e-mail.

property.name: SubscriptionMailReadMore
property.caption: Link text in the subscription e-mail
property.help: This text will build the link text that the user can click on in the subcription e-mail.

property.name: SubscriptionMailSubject
property.caption: Subject for subscription e-mail
property.help: This is the subject field for the subscription e-mail.

property.name: Thumbnail
property.caption: Thumbnail image
property.help: Specify an image to be shown in page listings where it applies

property.name: XForm
property.caption: Form
property.help: Specify the form that will be shown on this page. By clicking the button, you can create your own forms

pagetype.name: [Public] Demo page
pagetype.description: This page type gathers functions to show how different types of controls and technologies can interact with EPiServer and vice versa.
pagetype.name: [Public] Demo page
[Public] Document
pagetype.description: This page type is used to publish documents from Microsoft Office.
pagetype.name: [Public] Document
[Public] Document list
pagetype.description: This page type displays a list of documents published from Microsoft Office.
pagetype.name: [Public] Document list
[Public] File explorer
pagetype.description: This page type lists files from a folder on the web server.
pagetype.name: [Public] File listing
[Public] Login
pagetype.description: This page type is used to create a login page to the website.
pagetype.name: [Public] Login
[Public] News item
pagetype.description: This page type contains the data for one news item.
pagetype.name: [Public] News item
[Public] Registration
pagetype.description: This page type is where visitors can register themselves on the website.
pagetype.name: [Public] Registration
[Public] RSS source
pagetype.description: This page type displays information from EPiServer in RSS format.
pagetype.name: [Public] RSS source
[Public] Search page
pagetype.description: This page type displays the search result from the quick search bar and an interface for advanced search.
pagetype.name: [Public] Search page
[Public] SiteMap
pagetype.description: This page type creates a list of the content on all or part of the website.
pagetype.name: [Public] Site map
[Public] Standard page
pagetype.description: This page type is the most commonly used page on the website. It can be used for ordinary pages as well as for news and events.
pagetype.name: [Public] Standard page
[Public] Start page
pagetype.description: The start page is the main entrance to the website containing a main and secondary body as well as different listings for news, articles and events.
pagetype.name: [Public] Start page
[Public] Subscription
pagetype.description: This page type is used for visitors to select subscription information.
pagetype.name: [Public] Subscription
[Public] XForm page
pagetype.description: This page type extends the standard page with a form.
pagetype.name: [Public] Form page

error.incorrectemail: The e-mail address you've entered is incorrect
error.passwordlength: The password you've entered is too short. Min length:
error.passwordrepeat: The passwords you've entered do not match
